title: Swain makes Mundo look terrible now...
body:
With RoA and Tear, his ult. seems to outlast Mundo's and he does a high amount of AoE damage while also being ranged, having CC and being just as tanky in a teamfight.

I realize Mundo falls off due to % Pen/Mortal Reminder and lack of item scaling on his damage but I think he's just outclassed in almost every way by Swain as early as 25 minutes in. The only thing he does better at that point is taking turrets.

> swain should have better sustain when he needs to hit 5 people for the best case scenario and needs a huge mana pool to do it. mundo's % current health cost isn't nearly as taxing as long-term swain ults

With the new Tear and Swain's lower R cost, he can keep it on longer than before. I suppose Mundo has better sticking power 1vs1 but I don't think it matters much since Swain has his W, Q and if he really needs more, Rylai's will give him a 40% slow on everything. From playing Swain, the problem is less sticking power and more getting onto them initially. The new Swain may not have the same burst as before but he will still destroy any squishy if he lands W.

I agree that Mundo has more sustainable poke though. It's not actually better in terms of damage but the low CD and cost makes it fairly spammable. Its damage becomes negligible though unless you go a squishy Liandrys Mundo or something of that sort. 

I think Swain needs a longer CD on his ult.

Don't forget Mundo can build full tank and gets speed in his ult.

Comparing individual abilities without considering the whole champion isn't useful.

Mundo does have a mobility advantage due to ult. and his W CC reduction but he's not really that good in teamfights or late game. He shines mid game and is best on a low-income since his base damage is fairly good but doesn't get much better later. Swain is probably a far better top laner than Mundo at this point but at least Mundo can hide from Swain in the jungle. :D

Mundo can't be bursted down, Swain can if your team focuses him (and gets him with CC when he gets to 50% so he can't Zhonya's).  Mundo also has the advantage on not being completely reliant on his healing, where if you hit Swain with Grievous Wounds he is just a sorta beefy mage.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron of Bread,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1KdcpZnv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-19T20:10:40.114+0000)

Swain can pretty much tank 5 people and just Zhonya's to go back to full. He also can just birdform and hang around the sides of the fight. If your team bursts him, he's either doing it wrong or you have insane burst with an Annie/Veigar combo etc.

After the last round of Mundo nerfs, he has been just a tad on the weak side. For such a huge guy, it's odd he still has 125 AA range while Nautilus, Kench, Darius, Hecarim, Garen, Sion, Trundle, Wukong, Zac, Xin... (need I go on?) have 175 AA range. This is a QoL change Mudno needs because his E feels really lackluster when you can't even use it on someone more than a Teemo away from you.
